\w He|strong="H3389"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w began|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Abi|strong="H0021"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zacharias.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* good \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w stuck|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* steps, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

Wherefore \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* behaved \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* wisely. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Assyrians, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, \w and|strong="H6430"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w their|strong="H5221"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H5341"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fenced \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Osee \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ela \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Salmanasar \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Assyrians \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* besieged \w it|strong="H1931"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w For|strong="H4428"\w* \w after|strong="H7097"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* sixth \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8672"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Osee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* placed \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Hale, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Habor|strong="H2249"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Gozan|strong="H1470"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* hearkened \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* transgressed \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* Ezechias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* messengers \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Lachis, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w offended|strong="H2398"\w*, depart \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* all \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* tax \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Ezechias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Ezechias \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

\w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* Ezechias broke \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* plates \w of|strong="H4428"\w* gold \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w fastened|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* Tharthan \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Rabsaris, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Rabsaces \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Lachis \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* strong \w army|strong="H2426"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* conduit \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fuller’s|strong="H3526"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* Eliacim \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Helcias \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sobna \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Joahe \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Rabsaces \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ezechias: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Assyrians: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w confidence|strong="H0986"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* thou trustest?

\w Perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast taken \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* prepare thyself \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*. \w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* dost thou \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou darest \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w*?

Dost thou \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* broken \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*, \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lean|strong="H5564"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* break \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* pierce \w it|strong="H5921"\w*? \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* Pharao \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* Ezechias hath \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w see|strong="H0518"\w* \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.
